thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 4 of 101
thread.title: Vlad

author: Vlad
title: Vlad
text: Everything seems flawless with topcashback. I am using many cash back sites and topcashback is one of the top 3 favorites. Granted, sometimes(very rarely) you may not get the cashback, but I think that is because of the merchant, not the cash back site (and this happens with all of the cash back sites). In any case, I have earned a lot of cash back just by clicking the merchant's link before I make the purchase...
